title: Nova Writers Conspiracy
description: A collaborative writing platform that uses AI to help writers develop their stories through interactive character development and plot generation.
pitch: Revolutionizing collaborative storytelling through AI-powered character development and plot generation.
challenge: Creating an intuitive interface that balances AI assistance with human creativity, ensuring writers maintain control over their stories.
development: Built with React and Node.js, integrating OpenAI's GPT API for character generation and plot suggestions. Implemented real-time collaboration features.
outcome: Successfully launched beta with 50+ writers, achieving 85% user satisfaction and generating 200+ story concepts.

journey.title: Prototype Creation
journey.description: Building MVP with core AI features
